content: **chibi doll usagi is an easter inspired chibi amilishly doll with removable rabbit ears usagi is a japanese name meaning rabbit so it was fitting she would recieve this name usagi measures about 12 cm s when i crochet her with a 2 0mm hook excluding the ears in the measurements when you go up a hooksize she might be bigger but proportions remain intact this means gauge isn t important ** *this pattern is currently available in dutch german and us english the pattern can be downloaded without a charge but i don t regard this pattern as free rather as my gift to you to have something nice to enjoy while fighting corona together * > chibi doll usagi is a crocheted doll attached clothing and a removable headband this pattern includes the doll with her dress and headband she is made seamless so no seaming parts afterwards **yarn ** * yarn and colors must-have in different colors for the doll and clothes colors are pearl cream old pink larimar vanilla and green ice **hook ** this doll is crocheted with a 2 0mm hook and the suggested yarn above it s important to crochet tight enough since you don t want the fibrefill to show also don t crochet to tightly it ll be a strain on your wrists if you crochet loosely please go down a size if you crochet tightly go up a size the proportions of this girl stay intact **gauge** in single_crochet 17 single_crochet x 17 row measures 5x5 cm using must have and a 2 0mm hook gauge however is not important for this pattern different hooks and different yarn give you a different size for your doll but the proportions stay intact **notions** needle for weaving ends scissors fibrefill stitchmarker also needed glue and pins for her hair **techniques to indulge in** * crocheting in a spiral * increase * decrease * switching colors * crocheting in back and front loops only
